item.title: Add BrowserCat to developer APIs
item.description: https://www.browsercat.com - Headless browser API for automation, scraping, AI agent web access, image/pdf generation, and more. Free plan with 1k requests per month.

item.title: Removed MeiliSearch from Searches. No longer free
Adding SimpleRestore - a free tool by SimpleBackups.com
item.description:
https://simplebackups.com/) — Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, and Backblaze - Backup automation service for servers and databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB) stored directly into cloud storage providers (AWS, DigitalOcean, and Backblaze). Provides a free plan for 1 backup.
https://simplerestore.io - Hassle-free MySQL backup restoration. Restore MySQL backups to any remote database without code or a server.

item.title: Add tapform.com
item.description: https://tapform.com/ - Includes unlimited forms, unlimited fields, and unlimited submissions for free. Forms can either be displayed in a standard or a chat format.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.koyeb.com) - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 1GB memory, 1GB storage, and 0.25 CPU. No credit card is required to get started.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description:
https://www.koyeb.com - Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. No credit card is required to get started.
https://www.koyeb.com/) - Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US - Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 1GB memory, 1GB storage, and 0.25 CPU.

Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery.
